title: Implement shooter commands
body: Priority: High. Create test commands for the shooter subsystem.

title: Implement intake commands
body: Priority: High. Create commands for the intake subsystem.

title: Remove steer override from autos
body: Priority: High. Ensure autos are bulletproof by removing steer override from pathplanner.

title: Plan and diagram basic superstructure state machine
body: Priority: High. Minimum viable superstructure would include intaking and shooting as states. Create state diagram before implementation.

title: Implement localization pose from hub
body: Priority: High. Successfully get a pose from the hub if present.

title: Implement subsystem disable on robot disable
body: Priority: High. Stop all subsystems when robot is disabled.

title: Create test commands for aligning to target
body: Test commands for vision-based alignment to targets.

title: Determine starting positions for autos
body: Figure out optimal starting points for autonomous routines.

title: Prepare autos for Friday/Saturday testing
body: Need autonomous routines set up before Friday. Check with manufacturing if this timeline is realistic.

title: Implement build and formatting tests
body: Set up CI checks for build verification and code formatting.

title: Transition to branch-based development
body: Switch team workflow from direct commits to branch-based development with pull requests.

title: Research shoot on the move implementation
body: James needs to do deeper research into implementing shooting while the robot is moving.

title: Implement defense mode
body: Create a defense mode for robot operation.

title: Implement held fuel detection
body: Implement GAS TANK sensor integration for detecting held fuel in the robot.

title: Present localization implementation writeup
body: Create and present documentation on the localization implementation.

title: Test localization code
body: Verify localization code works as expected with real hardware.

title: Set up AprilTags on field
body: Install AprilTag markers on the practice field for vision testing.

title: Implement shooter commands
body: Priority: High. Create test commands for the shooter subsystem.
